promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple swan normal-type pokemon with golden feathers. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or swan. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Auracigna, a a massive simple swan normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Tight Jaw. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "swan", "normal" or "Auracigna". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, swan-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, bright lighting
generatedDescription: Auracigna, the gentle giant of the grasslands, merrily feeds on berries with a seemingly unyielding jaw. A vision of grace and power.
